name: webext-bot
description: An open-source Github Bot to report extension size change and extension version change on pull requests.
author: Amit Singh <amitsingh5198@gmail.com>

scripts.simulate:issues.opened: npm run dist && probot receive -e issues -p ./test/fixtures/issues.opened.json ./dist/src/app.js
scripts.simulate:pull_request.opened: npm run dist && probot receive -e pull_request -p ./test/fixtures/pull_request.opened.json ./dist/src/app.js
scripts.simulate:pull_request.synchronize: npm run dist && probot receive -e pull_request -p ./test/fixtures/pull_request.synchronize.json ./dist/src/app.js
scripts.simulate:workflow_run.completed: npm run dist && probot receive -e workflow_run -p ./test/fixtures/workflow_run.completed.json ./dist/src/app.js
